titlealts.searchtitle: Attribute: CARE PROFESSIONAL OPERATING SURGEON TYPE FOR CANCER - Description

div.p: The type of CARE PROFESSIONAL who operated on the PATIENT for the Cancer Outcomes and Services Data Set.

Note: National Code SI 'General Practitioner with an Extended Role (GPwER) ' has been updated in Data Dictionary Change Notice 1752 "Practitioners with a Special Interest Name Change". The Data Set specifications that contain this item will be updated in the next version of the Information Standard where it is not already correct.
